mapper.select: select id, code, name,sex, Inpatient_area, bed_num, sample_num, Inspection_dept, inspection_doc, inspection_date, test_doc, test_date, examine_doc, remark,sample_type from laola.patient where id = #{id}

select id, code, name,sex, Inpatient_area, bed_num, sample_num, Inspection_dept, inspection_doc, inspection_date, test_doc, test_date, examine_doc, remark,sample_type from laola.patient limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert:
insert into laola.patient(
id,
code, name, sex, Inpatient_area, bed_num, sample_num, Inspection_dept, inspection_doc, inspection_date, test_doc, test_date, examine_doc, remark ,sample_type) values ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{inpatientArea}, #{bedNum}, #{sampleNum}, #{inspectionDept}, #{inspectionDoc}, #{inspectionDate}, #{testDoc}, #{testDate}, #{examineDoc}, #{remark} ,#{sampleType})
mapper.update:
update laola.patient
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
Inpatient_area = #{inpatientArea},
bed_num = #{bedNum},
sample_num = #{sampleNum},
Inspection_dept = #{inspectionDept},
inspection_doc = #{inspectionDoc},
test_doc = #{testDoc},
test_date = #{testDate},
examine_doc = #{examineDoc},
remark = #{remark},
sample_type = #{sampleType},
id = #{id}
and DATE_FORMAT(inspection_date,"%Y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(#{testDate},"%Y-%m-%d")
mapper.delete: delete from laola.patient where id = #{id} and DATE_FORMAT(inspection_date,"%y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%y-%m-%d");
delete from laola.patient where DATE_FORMAT(inspection_date,"%y-%m-%d") = DATE_FORMAT(now(),"%y-%m-%d") and id in (select human_code FROM laola.project WHERE endtime is null );
